CustomField.description: Formula field which determines whether to display the Submit button. Shown if Status is Draft.
CustomField.formula: IF ( AND(ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Billing__Status__c, "Draft") ,NOT(ISBLANK( APTS_ACAT_Number__c )) ,NOT(ISNULL( APTS_ACAT_Number__c )),ISPICKVAL(APTS_Integration_Status__c, "Completed")), HYPERLINK("/apex/APTS_CreditMemoSubmit?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/APTS_Button_Submit", "Submit"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Submit
